---
title: "Stage 3"
---

Stage 3 is an optional placement year. General information is provided in the [Placement Year](https://plymouthpsychology.github.io/handbooks/placement_year.html) section.

Students in Stage 2 can find detailed information by visiting the DLE page for the module CPIE202 - Career and Placement Planning. This should be available via your DLE dashboard.

Students in Stage 3 (on placement) should consult the DLE page for the module CPIE501 - Placement: Psychology, via your DLE dashboard.

Alternatively, contact the School's Placements Co-ordinator, Ed Symes [ed.symes@plymouth.ac.uk](ed.symes@plymouth.ac.uk)
